search_results.full_title: Could’ve Just Left Me Alone by Alexa Cappelli
search_results.title: Could’ve Just Left Me Alone
search_results.lyrics:
Could’ve Just Left Me Alone Lyrics[Verse 1]
I should've known it when you gave me every compliment
Or when you told me that I spend too much time with my friends
Got me attached, so you could break my heart and play the victim
I bet you'd do it all again (All again)

[Pre-Chorus]
If you call me crying, I'll just wanna hang up on you
So don't bother, block my number
'Cause we're done (Done)
[Chorus]
Oh, it makes me sick
How you just quit on us
Months wasted
When you could've just left me alone
Oh, you're so basic
Got the same old tricks
Let me fall for it
When you could've just left mе alone

[Post-Chorus]
La-da, da, da-da
Da-da, da-da
La-da, da, da-da
Oh, you could've just left mе alone

[Verse 2]
I wouldn't have to try and puzzle piece my life together
After you came and you tore it up, so much for your "forever"
I wish I could believe that all this changed me for the better, no
I wouldn't recommend (I wouldn't recommend)

[Pre-Chorus]
If you call me crying, I'll just wanna hang up on you
So don't bother, block my number
'Cause we're done (Done)
You might also like[Chorus]
Oh, it makes me sick (Me sick)
How you just quit on us
Months wasted
When you could've just left me alone
Oh, you're so basic (Basic)
Got the same old tricks
Let me fall for it
When you could've just left me alone

[Post-Chorus]
La-da, da, da-da
Da-da, da-da
La-da, da, da-da
Oh, you could've just left me alone2Embed

search_results.title: Temporary
search_results.lyrics:
Temporary Lyrics[Verse 1]
Haven't talked in four months
Cut off all connection
Beating myself up about leaving you fighting for me
You had good intentions
But when I saw you it clicked
I guess that was all that I needed to know that if

[Pre-Chorus]
We were still together
By now we'd be at each other's throats
Tryna recover from another argument
Like who's the better lover
We don't know each other
We don't know each other at all
[Chorus]
I didn't end it just for me
Knew we'd break eventually
What's love if it's temporary?
I couldn't settle, you couldn't change
It was inevitable this way
We never got in too deep
Headed down a dead end street
What's love if it's temporary?
Headed down a dead end street
What's love if it's temporary?

[Verse 2]
I know what you're thinking
You weren't good enough for me
Those were your words
You said at first you couldn't see that

[Pre-Chorus]
If we were still together
By now we'd be fighting
Until we both lost our voices
So much for the silent treatment
I don't wanna do this as if
You wanna do this
But you say you're loyal to a fault
You might also like[Chorus]
I didn't end it just for me
Knew we'd break eventually
What's love if it's temporary?

It was inevitable this way
We never got in too deep

What's love if it's temporary?

Headed down a dead end street

search_results.title: SAY SOMETHING
search_results.lyrics:
SAY SOMETHING Lyrics[Verse 1]
Mutual friends met you in the summer, so innocent
Busy weekends, one after another
Dreaming, falling

[Pre-Chorus]
So flirtatious, you could be fun
But I'll only chase if there's somewhere to run

[Chorus]
Braver on the phone, than face-to-face
Playing hard to get, it ain't my thing
You're cool, but I don't wanna overthink
If you wanted me, you'd say something
Taking up all my energy
Wishing you would make a move on me
You're cool, but I don't wanna overthink
If you wanted me, you'd say something
[Verse 2]
Wanna forget it
Find a better problem to solve, then you (Solve you)
Heaven sent, thinkin' that you're perfect
I don't blame you (Blame you)

Wishing you would make a move on me
You're cool, but I don't wanna overthink
If you wanted me, you'd say something

[Post-Chorus]
If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something
If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something
If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something
If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something
You might also like[Bridge]

You would say, you would say something
If you wanted, if you wanted me

[Chorus]
Braver on the phone, than face-to-face
Playing hard to get, it ain't my thing
You're cool, but I don't wanna overthink
If you wanted me, you'd say something
Taking up all my energy
Wishing you would make a move on me
You're cool, but I don't wanna overthink

If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something
If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something
If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something
If you wanted me, you wanted me, you'd say something3Embed

description.plain: “SAY SOMETHING” is a testament to the phrase “If he wanted to, he would”. This summer jam was inspired by a guy Alexa was crushing on who was flattering over the phone, but when it came to being in person, wouldn’t look in her direction. Passing hints and looks obviously wasn’t enough to be overthinking about him as much as she was. Fun, energetic, and fierce, it’s got the makings of being the anthem for any and all relationships that could have been.

song.embed_content: Read “SAY SOMETHING” by Alexa Cappelli on Genius
song.title: SAY SOMETHING

body.plain: “SAY SOMETHING” is a testament to the phrase “If he wanted to, he would”. This summer jam was inspired by a guy Alexa was crushing on who was flattering over the phone, but when it came to being in person, wouldn’t look in her direction. Passing hints and looks obviously wasn’t enough to be overthinking about him as much as she was. Fun, energetic, and fierce, it’s got the makings of being the anthem for any and all relationships that could have been.

search_results.title: Imposter Syndrome
search_results.lyrics:
Imposter Syndrome Lyrics[Verse 1]
I don't wanna let anybody down
I'm the kinda girl people keep around
For never causing any problems
If you got 'em, I can solve 'em
I'd rather help you out and not let my guard down
But I kinda wanna make a mess
Stand up for myself to my fake friends
Never look back, never call back
Never think twice 'bout it or doubt it
Or try to get them to want to make amends
[Pre-Chorus]
I'm a walking contradiction, I know, at least I know that
Confused with myself, so hard to show, hard to show, but

[Chorus]
I want, I want, I want to be myself
Not get so caught up, caught up in everyone else
Stuck under the wеather, feeling sick
I can't help my diagnosis
Yeah, I'vе got imposter syndrome
Hate to admit it
Hate to admit it
Hate to admit it

[Verse 2]
I know it's a problem, yeah, I see it now
Tired of being a product of people I'm around, oh
There's a fine line between inspiration and aggravation
Of not being where they are
Like all my dreams are so far, like

[Pre-Chorus]
I'm a walking contradiction, I know, at least I know that
Confused with myself, so hard to show, hard to show, but

[Chorus]
I want, I want, I want to be myself
Not get so caught up, caught up in everyone else
Stuck under the weather, feeling sick
I can't help my diagnosis
Yeah, I've got imposter syndrome
Hate to admit it
Uh-huh, yeah, hate to admit it
Imposter syndrome, hate to admit it
Stuck under the weather, feeling sick
I can't help my diagnosis
Yeah, I've got imposter syndrome
Hate to admit itYou might also likeEmbed

search_results.title: ​​broke & lonely
search_results.lyrics:
​​broke & lonely Lyrics[Verse 1]
Hate it when I'm alone
Scrollin' through my exes on my dumb phone
Hate it when I'm too broke
To buy some common sense with all my student loans
How am I supposed to make it?
When everyone keeps telling me to fake it
Been wondering how to say it
I just wanna know

[Chorus]
Hey, does anyone know what they're doing?
I'm still undecided, just tryna live my life
And I'm low-key afraid of commitment
Tryna figure out what nobody told me how to be
Broke and lonely
[Verse 2]
Hate it when I'm at home
But whеn my friends invite me, I don't wanna go
It's my fault, I nеver learn
I tell 'em I'm an introvert
But I'm jealous they're not worried about their future

[Chorus]
Hey, does anyone know what they're doing? (What they're doing)
I'm still undecided, just tryna live my life
And I'm low-key afraid of commitment
Tryna figure out what nobody told me how to be
Broke and lonely
Broke and lonely
Broke and lonely
Broke and lonely

[Bridge]
I have trouble getting myself out of bed
Can't believe I ever let it get this bad
Hung up on needing someone to feel something
Thought I'd know what I want by twenty-something
Why is everything so damn expensive?
Getting into debt just for attention
Living it up or settling down?
Wish I knew what I want now
You might also like[Chorus]
Hey (Hey), does anyone know what they're doing? (I don't know what)
I'm still undecided, just tryna live my life
And I'm low-key afraid of commitment (More like high-key afraid of)
Tryna figure out what nobody told me how to be
Broke and lonely (Lonely)
Broke and lonely
Broke and lonely (Broke and lonely)
Broke and lonelyEmbed

search_results.title: Someone Better
search_results.lyrics:
Someone Better Lyrics[Verse 1]
I hoped
Held on, thinking maybe it'd be fine to
Break all my rules, letting myself like you
Turns out we're too different, no, it's not you

[Pre-Chorus]
I wish that this was easy
Don't wanna believe it
And I wish I could be mad
[Chorus]
But it's not like you yelled at me
Or said something terribly wrong
I'll keep the memories close
But I'm letting you go
There's just no remedy
Watching our spark turn to smoke
We've got nothing to show
No, I can only hope
That you know that I know
I could never dream of someonе better than you
Just someonе better for me

[Verse 2]
I know
I'm so hard to read, is that a crime though?
'Cause you're looking at me with both your eyes closed
If odds are against us, shouldn't we fold?

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, I wish that this was easy
Don't wanna believe it, but
It was good while it lasted
I wish that this was simple
It's more like pulling teeth though
I wish I could be mad
You might also like[Chorus]
But it's not like you yelled at me (No, no)
Or said something terribly wrong
I'll keep the memories close
But I'm letting you go
There's just no remedy
Watching our spark turn to smoke
We've got nothing to show
No, I can only hope
That you know that I know
I could never dream of someone better than you
Just someone better for me
Someone better for me

[Outro]
I wish that this was easy
Don't wanna believe it, but
It was good while it lastedEmbed

It's a lose, lose
